last_episode_to_air.name: Flight to India…
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jaspal has cancer, and it’s time for him to say goodbye to his family. Karenjit starts a new journey with a happily-ever-after with Daniel. A call from India to participate in Big Boss season 5 gives her a chance to start afresh!

name: Karenjit Kaur: The Untold Story of Sunny Leone
original_name: Karenjit Kaur: The Untold Story of Sunny Leone
overview: The life journey of Karenjit Kaur, showcasing her beginnings as an innocent, how she became India’s most googled celebrity, and everything which followed in between.

episodes.name: Talking Tough
episodes.overview: Journalist Anupam Chaubey interviews Sunny Leone, one of the most googled celebrities in India, and starts on a disparaging note. Unperturbed by his tone, Sunny (Karenjit Kaur) opens up about the lesser known facts of her early childhood.

episodes.name: From Canada to Los Angeles
episodes.overview: The Vohra family moves to Los Angeles where the rebel in teenage Karenjit begins to grow wings. With time though, Karenjit and her brother Sunny realise their responsibilities and keep looking out for ways to earn money and be financially independent.

episodes.name: Virgin Mary
episodes.overview: Karenjit and her brother feel shattered when they discover that their mother has a drinking problem and that their father has lost his job. A desperate Karenjit sets out to find work but faces a moral dilemma when offered a lingerie commercial.

episodes.name: Karenjit and Sunny's Deal
episodes.overview: When Karenjit accidentally learns about her brother’s well-kept secret, she gathers the courage to share her own secret with him. She reveals about the offer to work in an adult film and the siblings make a deal to keep each other’s secrets.

episodes.name: The Birth of Sunny Leone
episodes.overview: When the college teacher finds Karenjit’s adult video online, she drags her to the principal’s office. However, unflustered by the episode, she takes up the offer from Penthouse and must now think of a new name that would complement her bold and beautiful personality.

episodes.name: Penthouse Pet of the Year
episodes.overview: After trying her hand at a few odd jobs and failing at everything, Karenjit decides to continue with her career in the adult film industry. She makes good money and earns her family a better lifestyle. She then goes on to win the Penthouse Pet of the Year.

episodes.name: Karenjit Reveals the Truth
episodes.overview: Karenjit, finally, gathers the courage to reveal her truth to her parents. Shocked by this revelation, her parents and her best friend disown her. A dejected Karenjit is left to gather her life’s broken pieces.

episodes.name: How Karenjit Met her Husband
episodes.overview: Irritated with his immaturity, Sunny decides to dump and move on from her boyfriend, Chuck. In a fortuitous moment, she meets Daniel Webber at the Adult Video Awards and the duo hit it off instantly.

episodes.name: Humiliation for Family
episodes.overview: Ashamed of Karenjit’s profession, the relatives shun the Vohra family which hurts Karenjit’s parents. Following this, Karenjit’s brother, Sunny decides not to apply for admission in a reputed college just to be with his emotionally disturbed parents.

episodes.name: The Only Regret
episodes.overview: Karenjit makes an appearance on Richard Stone’s radio show where she is asked naughty questions. The interview creates a stir in the society and Karenjit’s parents are ostracised by their community. Karenjit has no regrets for her life choices but her only guilt is the community backlash and the trauma her parents had to endure because of her.

episodes.name: Beat around the Bush
episodes.overview: Nate proposes Karenjit as soon as she signs the contract. The 2004 US presidential elections once again pits Karenjit and her mother Balwant against each other as George Bush plans on banning pornography! Ecstatic with his win, Balwant takes to the bottle which has disastrous consequences

episodes.name: Guilty of Doing It our way
episodes.overview: The cold war brewing between Karenjit and Balwant finally leads to an explosive confrontation between the mother and daughter as they pose some rather uncomfortable questions to each other which were so far buried under the rug! Karenjit, on the other hand, decides to try something different for her business!

episodes.name: Is It Happily Ever After?
episodes.overview: Karenjit decides to grow her business by some new transitions in her business. She gets into heterosexual pornography with her fiancé Nate with whom she’s all set to tie the knot with, until the events at the Halloween party pose a threat to her plans.

episodes.name: The Princess and The Frogs
episodes.overview: Knowing that her prince was always a frog, Karen breaks up with Nate and heads for the AVA awards in Vegas where she meets Daniel. Though it’s sort of love at first sight, the fact that Daniel is with someone else, makes Karenjit turn on to the stand-up comedian Rusty!

episodes.name: The Last Wish!
episodes.overview: The Vohras are in Nahan, Himachal Pradesh to fulfil Balwant’s desire of visiting her hometown but the circumstances that have brought them to Nahan are not something that they ever imagined or hoped for!

episodes.name: Time to Say Goodbye
episodes.overview: Daniel and Sunny find the much-needed support in each other. But the Vohra family is in a vulnerable state with a disastrous turn of events that turn their lives upside down.

episodes.name: Born to be a Chef!
episodes.overview: Jaspal Singh Vohra gets into a relationship after Balwant’s death and shares the news with his kids. Frustrated with his dad, Sunny gets into a fight with the hotel chef but ends up with a job offer instead. Karenjit resumes her work and gets into a steady relationship with Daniel.

episodes.name: Princess Finds Her Prince
episodes.overview: Daniel and Karenjit find the much-needed support in each other. Sunny starts filming adult films exclusively with Daniel and Vivid. Karenjit decides to mend a few old relationships and make some new ones.

episodes.name: It’s Time to Grow Big!
episodes.overview: After completing the contract with Vivid, Daniel and Karenjit start with their own production house and reach great heights. Karenjit is disturbed by Janna’s retirement and starts planning for her own retirement.

episodes.name: Flight to India…
episodes.overview: Jaspal has cancer, and it’s time for him to say goodbye to his family. Karenjit starts a new journey with a happily-ever-after with Daniel. A call from India to participate in Big Boss season 5 gives her a chance to start afresh!
